displayProperties.description: Complete bounties, collect Elemental Orbs using a matching [Arc Kill] / [Solar Kill] / [Void Kill] subclass, and, as a team, defeat opposing Guardians in the Crucible or Gambit using Solar weapons.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Gloves (Renewed)

sourceString: Source: Earned during the 2019 Solstice of Heroes event.
